rows.title: Feel your feelings

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes.

Do you ever feel something so strongly that you want to run away from it?

Instead of moving away from the feeling, let’s move towards it for a moment.
It is ok. Close your eyes if you feel comfortable. Take a deep breath.

Become curious. Where are you feeling it in your body? Is it hot or cold? Hard or soft? Tight or loose?
Ask yourself some questions. What is it telling me? What does it need? How can I be kind to myself right now?

It is ok. Close your eyes if you feel comfortable. Take a deep breath.

Become curious. Where are you feeling it in your body? Is it hot or cold? Hard or soft? Tight or loose?
Ask yourself some questions. What is it telling me? What does it need? How can I be kind to myself right now?

text_1.eng: Being a great parent also means taking time to care for yourself every day. It starts with recognising how you feel.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: So good to hear you are feeling well today. You are incredible!

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: We all have days where we just don’t know. That is okay! You are here and that is what matters.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Being a parent can be hard. But you are here and that shows you want to keep improving things. That is a big accomplishment already!
